page.title: 10CABLE TV IN CROYDON
page.content: Cable TV is the latest thing in Croydon.Two local businessmen had the idea and named the company CROYDON CABLE.Croydon Cable will have thirty channels of diffrent subjects for all the family.It will cost #5.95 for seven channels per month which is the minimum of channels you can have.They have started laying cable for New Addington and their studio is there.It will take five years for the whole of Croydon to recieve cable television.It is costing #40 million to start.The studio recieves pictures from a satillite in space 23,000 miles away, then it is sent through the underground cables to your TV set. Altogether there is a one tenth of a second delay, then you recieve top quality sound and pictures.We are all very excited at the prospect of having Cable TV on the Forestdale estate.
